name: Pick a Slime
description:
Pick a Slime is a top-down puzzle about slimes, play as a slime, gather up all your slime friends in order to match the shape of the goal!

This game was made for GeoJam 2022, the theme was Pick a Side.

Controls:

WASD to move

Z to undo

R to reset

O and P to skip levels

Credits:

Programming, Music: Gearless

Art: PixiVan

Level Design: Busy Hamster/Jeffrey
